Key Match Events: Travis Jankowski made a leaping catch to rob Andrew Vaughn of a game-winning homer in the 9th inning
Corey Seager drove in the decisive run with a bloop single in the top of the 9th
Marcus Semien hit a tiebreaking RBI double in the 7th inning of the first game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox have lost six in a row and 10 of 11 overall
The White Sox are 4-32 since the All-Star break, moving closer to the franchise record of 106 losses in 1970
Others: Wyatt Langford hit a three-run homer in the second game for Texas
Gavin Sheets hit a tying single in the 5th inning of the nightcap
